test-set.name: xp-striding-roaming-free-rangingC
test-set.description: CP: Striding, RP: Roaming, RS: Free-ranging A child or descendant(-or-self) selection after a climbing expr that selects U{element, document}} is roaming/free-ranging

test-case.name: xp-striding-roaming-free-rangingC001
test-case.description: CP: striding, RP: roaming, RS: free-ranging Base expression: parent::foo Separators: / With axes: child, descendant, descendant-or-self With node types: element, document, comment, pi, text, any-node, elem-doc Invariant: none

modified.change: Added dependency for sweep and posture tests, added @part attribute for subtests

test-case.name: xp-striding-roaming-free-rangingC002
test-case.description: CP: striding, RP: roaming, RS: free-ranging Base expression: parent::ex:foo Separators: / With axes: child, descendant, descendant-or-self With node types: element, document, comment, pi, text, any-node, elem-doc Invariant: none

modified.change: Added dependency for sweep and posture tests, added @part attribute for subtests
